import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Registration.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../App/App.css'; import LandingNavBar from '../LandingNavBar/LandingNavBar'; import LandingFooter from '../LandingFooter/LandingFooter'; export default class Registration extends Component { render() { return (

Create New Account

Your username must at least 3 characters long.
Your password must be 4-10 characters long, contain letters and numbers, and must must not contain character ( ) [ ] . { } or emoji.
) } }
